title: What authors would you consider, to be the most informative, easy to understand, and knowledgeable, to help me learn more about Hindu philosophy? I love physics, and am very drawn to Nataraj. Thankyou, Usha - Quora

response.answer_text: Hindu dharma has given rise to six systems of philosophy, and small bits of the Scriptures can be explored philosophically, but if you really want to follow Hindu dharma in a satisfying way, study the Scriptures instead. The best way to study Vedic scriptures is under a Guru, who is शोत्रिय, ब्रह्मनिष्ठ, तत्वदर्शी and ज्ञानी।
Swami vivekananda( karma yoga,bcoz it's easy 2 understand) and swami sivananda of divine life society.
